ingredients.ingredient: 2 (3 ounce) packages lemon flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
1 (3.4 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

cookingTips: Pierce cake all over with fork before pouring gelatin mixture for proper absorption
Chill thoroughly between layers for stable, clean slicing
Reserve some whipped topping for garnish before folding into pudding
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This refreshing icebox cake depends on proper timing and chilling. Guide the user through each stage of assembly and why allowing adequate chilling time is essential.
